description:
Hiromi is Kazuma`s mother. She met Toshiharu while working as a nurse at the hospital in which Tsubasa was treated for her skateboarding accident.
She`s young, nice and well-mannered, but she sometimes snaps, comically showing her true nature, which is why Tsubasa once told her "you remind me of a friend of mine" (referring to Yukino).
name: Ikeda Izumi
